Text: FW resume Michelle NortonKevin Thanks for the referral Hope all is well with you I agree with Billy on Michelle We are really focused on candidates with strong quantitative backgrounds and dont think that Michelle would be a fit for the program However I will forward her resume on to Elyse if you would like Also just wanted to see if you wanted us to formally communicate our decision to Michelle or if you would be relaying this message to her Let me know Traci Original Message From Lemmons Jr Billy Sent Tuesday July PM To Hyatt Kevin Cc Warner Traci Subject FW resume Michelle Norton Kevin Thanks for the referral Ive also copied Traci who leads Recruiting I dont really see Michelle as a fit in the Program A couple of years ago the Program experimented with a Marketing track but weve moved away from that concept Were now focused on trying to find people who can be successful in the Program at large You can try Community Relations Elyse Kalmans to see if there is any interest there Please let Traci know if her team needs to formally respond to Michelle I hope all is well with you and thanks again for the referral Best regards Billy Original Message From Hyatt Kevin Sent Tuesday July PM To Lemmons Jr Billy Davis Sarah A Subject FW resume Michelle Norton Billy attached is the resume of Michelle Norton She is a recent graduate of the Univ of Houston and is pursuing a career in community public relations I was wondering if we could get her in the next analyst candidate pool or look at placing her direct into something like community affairs if she was qualified thanks for the help Kevin Hyatt x

FW Main menu mock Just wanted to let you know things are progressing nicely on the Houston Video Mark Palmers group have given me support on the video copy and Beth Stier has stayed in contact with the video company to ensure quality for us I will set up some time to go over the mock up with you later this week Hope all is well with you Traci Original Message From Tara Osborn mailto Sent Wednesday April PM To Subject Main menu mock Traci Good morning I have worked up a mock for the main menu for the Houston Project we are working on This will come onto the screen after the video you will us it to navigate to your custom page If you could please take a look at the mock at this linkhoustonindexhtm Please let me know your feedback Thank you Tara Tara Osborn Multimedia Developer NION Interactive Solutions Capital of Texas Highway Suite B Austin Texas ext

FW Summer Intern ListSallie Patricia Payton from our group informed me that you wanted the calendar for our summer events I have attached the latest version of our events however we are still considering changing it slightly I will update you if anything changes from this calendar Traci Original Message From Giovannini Jana Sent Tuesday May AM To Warner Traci Cc Thompson Patti Subject FW Summer Intern List Importance High Traci Per Pattis note below can you please have someone in your group provide the summer intern event schedule to Sally Beck Thanks Original Message From Thompson Patti Sent Monday May PM To Giovannini Jana Richards Andrea Subject Summer Intern List Importance High Jana or Andrea Can you help me out with some information on Summer Interns I am attaching a spreadsheet would like you to fill in Intern End Date for all of the Interns with the exception of Ben Katz who is not in AA program Also Sally wanted a calendar of any planned events or trainings scheduled for the interns Thanks Patti x

Associate Super SaturdayWe are bringing in Associate Candidates for Super Saturday this upcoming weekend and we are looking for associates to help host our Saturday evening dinner at Tealas West Dallas The dinner will be from pm pm If you are available to help out please email Dolores Muzzy We will also have another Associate Super Saturday on the weekend of November th December nd We will be in need again of dinner host for the Saturday evening dinner It will be at the same time and also at Tealas If you are not available this weekend but would like to participate on the next Associate Super Saturday please email Dolores Muzzy as well Thanks for your participation Dolores

Reminder Bossa Social Event CHANGE Just a Reminder Help restore a childs hope and imagination through reading Donate a book to a child affected by Americas tragedy Yesterday morning you were invited to a social gathering on Wednesday September at Bossa In light of this weeks tragedy we would like to use our time together to help support those individuals whose lives have been torn apart Most importantly the children of families affected by this tragedy First Lady Laura Bush stated in a letter written to the nations schoolchildren on Thursday Our nation is strong and our people resilient We have a wellearned reputation for pulling together in the worst of times to help each other All of us gain comfort from different things Think about what gave you comfort as a child a special toy a teddy bear a favorite book When you come to our Quarterly Event next week we ask that you bring a childrens book to donate to a child to help comfort him or her Please take the time to inscribe a personal note inside of your book showing a child that you care By doing so each child will know that your thoughts and prayers are with him or her during this difficult time We have changed the focus of our event to support those affected by this tragedy and will kick off a week long childrens book drive Please join us at Bossa on Wednesday from PM PM and take the opportunity to touch the life of someone directly affected by this tragedy If you would like to make a cash donation to help with Enrons relief effort matching gift forms will be available at the gathering and Enron will match your contribution to We look forward to seeing you Sincerely Traci Warner Director AA Recruiting

Welcome to Advantage the new monthly newsletter from the Associate Analyst Program Were a big family we have close to associates and analysts working all over the globe and we want to keep you current on whats going on We have new programs perspectives and opportunities to tell you about as well as births marriages and social events We know you dont have much time so we will use this newsletter as a quick way to stay in touch Were welcoming our latest class of or so Associates and Analysts who have recently joined Enron Newcomers and oldtimers will find that the AA Program is a great foundation for their careers at Enron Some of our activities are learning experiences and some are just plain fun But they all help to build your network within Enron which you will draw on frequently in the years ahead So heres to a great Fall I look forward to seeing some of you this month at our pizza and brownbag lunches and at other occasions Let me know how things are going And lets stay in touch Regards Billy Lemmons VP AA Program Fall Recruiting Season Kickoff Its a great time to be recruiting new Associates and Analysts to Enron While other organizations have cut back on new hires Enrons appetite for new talent remains robust In this environment we expect to recruit the best of the best Were visiting a broader list of universities than ever before In the past we may have preferred hiring students from only a select group of schools The reality is that we value diversity and top performers come from many different schools As such we think it is best to cast a wider shallower net rather than go too deep into the talent pool in only a few places We need your help The AA program is introducing a more targeted approach to recruiting so we can focus on the best prospects We would like to use you and others like you alumni former residents of the state and people who are just excited to be at Enron to close the deal by communicating our story Nothings better than personal experience to prove that the opportunities here truly are limitless If you are interested in helping out email Traci Warner at mailto The Quarterly Event Is Now a Chance to Help Wednesday Sept was supposed to be a night of joy a chance for everyone to welcome our new Associates and Analysts at our first Houston Quarterly Event at Bossa In light of last weeks terror and destruction we are turning the occasion into a kickoff of a weeklong book drive We are asking pool members to purchase a childrens book and inscribe a special message to a child who has been touched by this tragedy We hope this small act of hope and caring gives emotional support to families during this time of need If you would like to make a cash donation to help with Enrons relief effort matching gift forms will be available at the gathering and Enron will match your contribution to For more information or to reserve your place please RSVP to Donna Jones at ext or Jackie Coleman at ext The Book Drive at Bossa Sept from pm to pm Main Street Houston September Birthdays Join us in wishing the following Associates and Analysts a happy birthday this September Amanda Schultz Felipe Jens Vacharapol Sanguanruang Murlidhar Nagwani Scott Griffin Juan Cabrales Christopher Czuppon Jonathan Pielop Kourtney Nelson Guillermo Balmaceda David Loosley Alejandro Hernandez Veiga Shruti GandhiGupta Shauywn Smith Shilpa Chunchu Lisa Connolly Jennifer Myers Jason Huang Martin Gonzalez Michelle Merritt Stephen Perich Jana Pair Marlon Farlough Brian Falik Mauricio Mora Brandon Luna Suzette Emmons David Michels Moises Benchluch Brian Terp Ching Lun Timmy Ng Nikolas Wexler Ying Liu Jaryn Levitas Martin Sonesson Natalie A Nichols Laura Bosek Vikram Abhyankar Aaron Berutti Jason Thompkins Stephanie Hopkins Erika Breen Jeffrey Snyder Javier Li Elena Robciuc Juan Samudio Kenneth Jett Robert Fuller Jennifer Bagwell Marilyn Baker Michael Yosowitz Philip Polsky AAseptember is a publication of the Associate Analyst Program Dont forget to allow us to celebrate births marriages and other important events with you We want to hear from you Submit story ideas via email to Embedded Picture Metafile

Last nights kickoff for the Childrens Book Drive was a huge success We had a fantastic turnout raised and collected three boxes full of books Many people wrote personal inscriptions in the books to the children reminding them that they were in our thoughts and prayers Enron Corp has offered to match our contributions to making the total contribution from the pool The drive is not over yet We will accept books and cash until September th You can come by and visit us on the th floor to make a donation We are looking forward to seeing everyone in October for our Halloween Social This event is going to be hosted by EGM Stay tuned for more details Thanks again for a fantastic evening Sincerely Traci Warner Director AA Recruiting
